SEARCH
Module com.mybank
Package com.mybank

Class Model

java.lang.Object
com.mybank.Model
public class Model extends Object
This class represents the Model in the Model-View-Controller pattern. It is responsible for managing the data and the business logic of the application. The Model communicates with the Bank object to perform banking operations. The Model also communicates with the Controller and the View to update the user interface.

      public Model(Bank b)
      Constructor for the Model class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • setController

      public void setController(Controller controller)
      Sets the controller for this model.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller to be set.

    • setView

      public void setView(View view)
      Sets the view for this model.
      Parameters:
      view - The view to be set.

    • setAccount

      public void setAccount(int accNumber, String accPasswd)
      Sets the account number and password for this model.
      Parameters:
      accNumber - The account number to be set.
      accPasswd - The account password to be set.

    • getCurrentAccount

      public BankAccount getCurrentAccount()
      Gets the current account associated with this model.
      Returns:
      The current account.

    • initialise

      public void initialise(String message)
      Initializes the ATM with a given message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be displayed upon initialization. This message is displayed in the TextArea of the GUI.

    • setState

      public void setState(String newState)
      Changes the state of the ATM.
      Parameters:
      newState - The new state to be set.

    • processNumber

      public void processNumber(String label)
      Processes a number input. Also updates the display with the corresponding number. Also handles potential integer overflow problems and the "00" button.
      Parameters:
      label - The number to be processed. This number is displayed in the TextField of the GUI.

    • processClear

      public void processClear()
      Processes the Clear button - reset the number (and number display string)

    • processEnter

      public void processEnter()
      Processes the Enter button - what we do depends what state the ATM is already in

    • changePassword

      public int changePassword(String currentPassword, String newPassword, String confirmPassword)
      Changes the password of the account.
      Parameters:
      currentPassword - The current password of the account.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      confirmPassword - The confirmation of the new password.
      Returns:
      The status of the password change operation.

    • changeOverdraft

      public int changeOverdraft(String overdraft)
      Changes the overdraft limit of the account.
      Parameters:
      overdraft - The new overdraft limit to be set.
      Returns:
      The status of the overdraft change operation.

    • processWithdraw

      public void processWithdraw()
      This method is used to process a withdrawal. If the user is logged in or depositing, it prompts the user to enter a withdrawal amount and sets the state to WITHDRAWING. If the user is not logged in, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • makeWithDrawal

      public void makeWithDrawal()
      This method is used to make a withdrawal. It attempts to withdraw the specified amount from the bank. If the withdrawal is successful, it informs the user and updates their balance. If the withdrawal fails, it checks the type of account and informs the user accordingly.

    • processDeposit

      public void processDeposit()
      This method is used to process a deposit. If the user is logged in, it prompts the user to enter a deposit amount and sets the state to DEPOSITING. If the user is not logged in, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • makeDeposit

      public void makeDeposit()
      This method is used to make a deposit. It attempts to deposit the specified amount into the bank. If the deposit is successful, it informs the user and updates their balance. If the deposit fails, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • processBalance

      public void processBalance()
      This method is used to process a balance check. If the user is logged in, it displays the user's balance. If the user is not logged in, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • processTransfer

      public void processTransfer()
      This method is used to process a transfer. If the user is logged in, it prompts the user to enter the target account and sets the state to ENTERING_ACCOUNT. If the user is not logged in, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • makeTransfer

      public void makeTransfer()
      This method is used to make a transfer. It attempts to transfer the specified amount to the target account. If the transfer is successful, it informs the user and updates their balance. If the transfer fails, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • formatBalance

      public static String formatBalance(int balance)
      This method is used to format the balance. It formats the balance as a string with a currency symbol. If the balance is negative, it adds a message about overdraft.
      Parameters:
      balance - The balance to be formatted, represented as an integer.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the balance, formatted with a currency symbol and potentially an overdraft message.

    • processStatement

      public void processStatement()
      This method is used to process a statement request. If the user is logged in, it displays the user's statement. If the user is not logged in, it informs the user and resets the state.

    • processUnknownKey

      public void processUnknownKey(String action)
      This method is used to process an unknown key. It resets the state and informs the user about the error.
      Parameters:
      action - The action that was not recognized, represented as a string.

    • processCancel

      public void processCancel()
      This method is used to process a cancel request. It resets the state and informs the user that the transaction has been cancelled.

    • processLogout

      public void processLogout()
      This method is used to process a logout request. It logs the user out and resets the state.

    • display

      public void display()
      This method is used to update the display. It updates the display with the current state information.
